code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:0,status:'idle'};export var timeIndexSlice=createSlice({name:'timeIndex',initialState:initialState,reducers:{increment:function increment(state,action){if(state.value>=action.payload-1){state.value=0;}else{state.value+=1;}},decrement:function decrement(state){state.value-=1;},incrementByAmount:function incrementByAmount(state,action){state.value+=action.payload;},arbitraryValue:function arbitraryValue(state,action){state.value=action.payload;}}});var _timeIndexSlice$actio=timeIndexSlice.actions,increment=_timeIndexSlice$actio.increment,decrement=_timeIndexSlice$actio.decrement,incrementByAmount=_timeIndexSlice$actio.incrementByAmount,arbitraryValue=_timeIndexSlice$actio.arbitraryValue;export{increment,decrement,incrementByAmount,arbitraryValue};export var selectCount=function selectCount(state){return state.timeIndex.value;};export default timeIndexSlice.reducer;
